title: Bloomberg Markets: CEOs Turn Backs on Trump Business Council
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: CEOs Turn Backs on Trump Business Council
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Jeff Green Managing Diversity Reporter Bloomberg News Discussing Merck & Co.’s Kenneth Frazier, Under Armour Inc.’s Kevin Plank and Intel Corp.’s Brian Krzanich  all stepped down from a White House business group on set up to advise Donald Trump.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
